bill.title: Public Safety - 9-1-1 Emergency Telephone System (Carl Henn's Law)
bill.description: Requiring the Emergency Number Systems Board to establish certain minimum standards for records retention guidelines for 9-1-1 audio, video, text messages, and data; requiring the Board to establish minimum standards for certain 9-1-1 systems that ensure access for individuals with disabilities; altering the purposes of the 9-1-1 Trust Fund beginning on January 1, 2020; authorizing the use of money collected from a certain 9-1-1 fee to pay costs associated with maintenance, operations, and programs approved by the Board; etc.

history.action: First Reading Health and Government Operations
Favorable with Amendments Report by Health and Government Operations
